content: engl shell and hungar an and turk shell pattern uploaded --- this cute little bunny is a fast project to make as a gift for easter or any time of the year --- can be made in 2 hours --- give a special personality with a different face some flowers buttons ribbons or as you wish --- doesn t need more than 50g yarn some work and love --- used 6mm safety eyes and 9 mm safety nose --- use any kind of cotton or acrylic yarn with one number smaller hook than adviced on the yarnlabel projects welcomed at ravelry facebook instagram with #zipzipbunny #zipzipdreams hashtag húsvétig játék az ötletmozsáron https //www facebook com/otletmozsar/posts/1353384261410196 notif_t=feedback_reaction_generic&notif_id=1490912467371449
